name: lambda-genbot
description: Uses generative AI to create image based on given prompt
author: CASE

scripts.build: npm run build:retrieve && npm run build:generate
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:retrieve && npm run deploy:generate
scripts.deploy:generate: npm run build:generate && sam deploy --template-file template-generate.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --s3-prefix lambda-genbot --s3-bucket case-consulting-mgmt-sam-deployments --stack-name lambda-genbot --profile mgmt
scripts.deploy:retrieve: npm run build:retrieve && sam deploy --template-file template-retrieve.yaml --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --s3-prefix lambda-genbot-retrieve --s3-bucket case-consulting-mgmt-sam-deployments --stack-name lambda-genbot-retrieve --profile mgmt
scripts.local:generate: npm run build:generate && sam local invoke GenBotFunction -e event-generate.json --profile mgmt
scripts.local:retrieve: npm run build:retrieve && sam local invoke GenBotRetrieveFunction -e event-retrieve.json --profile mgmt
